show.subtitle: Dr. Len and Nurse Vicki discuss various natural and holistic health topics while taking your calls.
show.title: Prescriptions For Health

title: Prescriptions For Health
content:
Why is mainstream medicine claiming to include CAM when it doesn’t respect it? Why is it important to spice up your meals?
Why is ADHD becoming a pandemic?
How can the holidays increase your risk for a heart attack?
What common medication does a pregnant mother take that can cause her baby to be fat at age 7?
Vicki’s 20-20 tips are: The amazing benefits of bananas.
A healthy addition to your smoothie that will surprise you.
